<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Find the first executable file \\p Name in \\p Paths.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This does not perform hashing as a shell would but instead stats each PATH</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// entry individually so should generally be avoided. Core LLVM library</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// functions and options should instead require fully specified paths.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Name name of the executable to find. If it contains any system</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   slashes, it will be returned as is.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Paths optional list of paths to search for \\p Name. If empty it</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   will use the system PATH environment instead.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns The fully qualified path to the first \\p Name in \\p Paths if it</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   exists. \\p Name if \\p Name has slashes in it. Otherwise an error.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/erroror">ErrorOr&lt;std::string&gt;</a></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// These functions change the specified standard stream (stdin or stdout) mode</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// based on the Flags. They return errc::success if the specified stream was</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// binary mode. They return errc::success if the specified stream</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This function executes the program using the arguments provided.  The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// invoked program will inherit the stdin, stdout, and stderr file</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// descriptors, the environment and other configuration settings of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// invoking program.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This function waits for the program to finish, so should be avoided in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// library functions that aren&#39;t expected to block. Consider using</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// ExecuteNoWait() instead.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns an integer result code indicating the status of the program.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A zero or positive value indicates the result code of the program.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// -1 indicates failure to execute</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// -2 indicates a crash during execution or timeout</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#abb13fbc7f52c659966b05092b19e6e19">ExecuteAndWait</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Program, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; Path of the program to be executed. It is</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; presumed this is the result of the findProgramByName method.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;StringRef&gt;</a> Args, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; An array of strings that are passed to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; program.  The first element should be the name of the program.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; The array should &#42;&#42;not&#42;&#42; be terminated by an empty StringRef.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::optional&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;StringRef&gt;</a>&gt; Env =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">          std::nullopt, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; An optional vector of</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; strings to use for the program&#39;s environment. If not provided, the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; current program&#39;s environment will be used.  If specified, the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; vector should &#42;&#42;not&#42;&#42; be terminated by an empty StringRef.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt;std::optional&lt;StringRef&gt;&gt; Redirects = &#123;&#125;, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; An array of optional paths. Should have a size of zero or three.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; If the array is empty, no redirections are performed.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; Otherwise, the inferior process&#39;s stdin(0), stdout(1), and stderr(2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; will be redirected to the corresponding paths, if the optional path</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; is present (not \\c std::nullopt).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; When an empty path is passed in, the corresponding file descriptor</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; will be disconnected (ie, /dev/null&#39;d) in a portable way.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SecondsToWait = 0, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; If non-zero, this specifies the amount</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; of time to wait for the child process to exit. If the time</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; expires, the child is killed and this call returns. If zero,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; this function will wait until the child finishes or forever if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; it doesn&#39;t.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MemoryLimit = 0, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; If non-zero, this specifies max. amount</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; of memory can be allocated by process. If memory usage will be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; higher limit, the child is killed and this call returns. If zero</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; - no memory limit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::string &#42;ErrMsg = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; If non-zero, provides a pointer to a</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; string instance in which error messages will be returned. If the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; string is non-empty upon return an error occurred while invoking the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="comment">      ///&lt; program.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;ExecutionFailed = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::optional&lt;ProcessStatistics&gt; &#42;ProcStat = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; If non-zero,</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="comment">      /// provides a pointer to a structure in which process execution</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="comment">      /// statistics will be stored.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &#42;AffinityMask = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; CPUs or processors the new</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="comment">                                        /// program shall run on.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">  );</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Similar to \\ref ExecuteAndWait, but returns immediately.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns The \\ref ProcessInfo of the newly launched process.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\note On Microsoft Windows systems, users will need to either call</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\ref Wait until the process has finished executing or win32&#39;s CloseHandle</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// API on ProcessInfo.ProcessHandle to avoid memory leaks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo">ProcessInfo</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a76fe26a8f1401a60839398dedb2f170c">ExecuteNoWait</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Program, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;StringRef&gt;</a> Args,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::optional&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;StringRef&gt;</a>&gt; Env,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt;std::optional&lt;StringRef&gt;&gt; Redirects = &#123;&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;ExecutionFailed = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, BitVector &#42;AffinityMask = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="comment">      /// If true the executed program detatches from the controlling</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return true if the given arguments fit within system-specific</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a8f03c560e53b510e60a472723126bb52"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a8f03c560e53b510e60a472723126bb52">commandLineFitsWithinSystemLimits</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Program,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return true if the given arguments fit within system-specific</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// argument length limits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a8f03c560e53b510e60a472723126bb52">commandLineFitsWithinSystemLimits</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Program,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// File encoding options when writing contents that a non-UTF8 tool will</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// read (on Windows systems). For UNIX, we always use UTF-8.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6c"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6c">WindowsEncodingMethod</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// UTF-8 is the LLVM native encoding, being the same as &quot;do not perform</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// encoding conversion&quot;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6caf0fd365beea6ebcbd1e26eb24015da53"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6caf0fd365beea6ebcbd1e26eb24015da53">WEM&#95;UTF8</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6ca4a36ece054fa83562738192455180088"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6ca4a36ece054fa83562738192455180088">WEM&#95;CurrentCodePage</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6ca89ceaeaaf604a94c4691ea915ada8c3c"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6ca89ceaeaaf604a94c4691ea915ada8c3c">WEM&#95;UTF16</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Saves the UTF8-encoded \\p contents string into the file \\p FileName</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// using a specific encoding.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This write file function adds the possibility to choose which encoding</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to use when writing a text file. On Windows, this is important when</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// writing files with internationalization support with an encoding that is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// different from the one used in LLVM (UTF-8). We use this when writing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// response files, since GCC tools on MinGW only understand legacy code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// pages, and VisualStudio tools only understand UTF-16.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// For UNIX, using different encodings is silently ignored, since all tools</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// work well with UTF-8.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This function assumes that you only use UTF-8 &#42;text&#42; data and will convert</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// it to your desired encoding before writing to the file.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// FIXME: We use EM&#95;CurrentCodePage to write response files for GNU tools in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// a MinGW/MinGW-w64 environment, which has serious flaws but currently is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// our best shot to make gcc/ld understand international characters. This</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// should be changed as soon as binutils fix this to support UTF16 on mingw.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns non-zero error&#95;code if failed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::error&#95;code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#ae1fa64c0bf9c723c5960fdd815df37df"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#ae1fa64c0bf9c723c5960fdd815df37df">writeFileWithEncoding</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> FileName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Contents,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">                        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6c">WindowsEncodingMethod</a> Encoding = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6caf0fd365beea6ebcbd1e26eb24015da53">WEM&#95;UTF8</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This function waits for the process specified by \\p PI to finish.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns A \\see ProcessInfo struct with Pid set to:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\li The process id of the child process if the child process has changed</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// state.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\li 0 if the child process has not changed state.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\note Users of this function should always check the ReturnCode member of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the \\see ProcessInfo returned from this function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo">ProcessInfo</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a7defb51d8d6a2eba7a428d1a22f08bad"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a233737223c9a3dba810df5b91bc91d1fa49bfe5e1e40e44e387a5e03c6ca759c5">Wait</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo">ProcessInfo</a> &amp;PI, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; The child process that should be waited on.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">       std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; SecondsToWait, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; If std::nullopt, waits until</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="comment">       ///&lt; child has terminated.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="comment">       ///&lt; If a value, this specifies the amount of time to wait for the child</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="comment">       ///&lt; process. If the time expires, and \\p Polling is false, the child is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="comment">       ///&lt; killed and this &lt; function returns. If the time expires and \\p</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="comment">       ///&lt; Polling is true, the child is resumed.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="comment">       ///&lt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="comment">       ///&lt; If zero, this function will perform a non-blocking</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="comment">       ///&lt; wait on the child process.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">       std::string &#42;ErrMsg = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; If non-zero, provides a pointer to a</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="comment">       ///&lt; string instance in which error messages will be returned. If the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="comment">       ///&lt; string is non-empty upon return an error occurred while invoking the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="comment">       ///&lt; program.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">       std::optional&lt;ProcessStatistics&gt; &#42;ProcStat =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; If non-zero, provides</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="comment">       /// a pointer to a structure in which process execution statistics will</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="comment">       /// be stored.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Polling = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; If true, do not kill the process on timeout.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">  );</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Print a command argument, and optionally quote it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a2407bfb7839e9f051cd446d587f978be">printArg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">llvm::raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Arg, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Quote);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#if defined(&#95;WIN32)</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Given a list of command line arguments, quote and escape them as necessary</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to build a single flat command line appropriate for calling CreateProcess</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// on</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Windows.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/erroror">ErrorOr&lt;std::wstring&gt;</a> flattenWindowsCommandLine(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;StringRef&gt;</a> Args);</Highlight></CodeLine>
